channel.title: Decorator Pattern on Adam Coding Corner
channel.description: Recent content in Decorator Pattern on Adam Coding Corner

item.title: Decorator Pattern in Kotlin
item.description: The Decorator pattern is used where creating separate classes which are a combination of all possibilities would result in their explosion. This pattern focuses on creating object layers to transparently and dynamically complement objects with new tasks. The decorator provides an object with the same interface as the decorated object.
